channel.title: aws on Luke Salamone's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in aws on Luke Salamone's Blog

item.title: S3 Bucket Url
item.description: Assuming your bucket is publicly accessible, the url of your S3 bucket will be http://[bucket-name].s3-website-[region].amazonaws.com For example for “mybucket” in “us-east-1” your url will be http://mybucket.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com
